nodes.bodyText: why is this property need to be set now?
It is for setting to use logback properly for the YARN job. It used to be not setup when running using remote hadoop.
it would be good to check number of args and throw appropriate error in case some one modifies caller to not provide any args
please add comment on why this is needed
I dont think this in needed in dataproc environment now.
It is still needed for the YarnTwillRunnerService
May be we should move this to another class rather than creating its own object just to call non static methods
The static main method is the entry point for Java application. The instance of this class is to do the actual work.
initialize should also be called in try in case initialization fails, all the started services should be stopped. Otherwise JVM may not exit due to non demon thread hanging
